titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to designate the 29th day in May of each year as "John Fitzgerald Kennedy Memorial Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to designate May 29 of each year as John Fitzgerald Kennedy Memorial Day.
